This was just what I was looking for, a dedicated app to use for netflix so I do not have to enable DRM on my web browser, and so I dont have to enable my web history to meet netflixes insane standards, I can now just run it in this sandboxed electron app without any issues.

There is no reason to use this software. It simply copies the surface from regular browsers 1:1, for YouTube there isn't even an adblocker, also there aren't any special features, and any possible settings have to be changed by programming it by myself.

I can configure this player to start Netflix in fullscreen mode as default action. It strores my account data so I do not have to logon in Netflix every time I start the software (chrome is configured to don't store any logon data a addon deletes all browser data after closing chrome so watching Netflix with the web browser is very inconvenient). I like it.
